import AOS from "aos"; import "aos/dist/aos.css"; import React from "react"; import "./about-page.css"; import aboutImg from "../../assets/about-img.jpg"; import css from "../../assets/skills/css.png"; import git from "../../assets/skills/git.png"; import html from "../../assets/skills/html.png"; import js from "../../assets/skills/js.png"; import mui from "../../assets/skills/mui.png"; import react from "../../assets/skills/react.png"; import redux from "../../assets/skills/redux.png"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import chrome from "../../assets/skills/chrome.png"; import figma from "../../assets/skills/figma.png"; import github from "../../assets/skills/github.png"; import npm from "../../assets/skills/npm.png"; import photoshop from "../../assets/skills/photoshop.png"; import vscode from "../../assets/skills/vscode.png"; const AboutPage = () => { useEffect(() => { AOS.init(); AOS.refresh(); }, []); return (

About Me

My name is Fauzi. I am well-versed in the latest frontend technologies and have a keen interest in React. With a solid foundation in modern web development practices, I am continuously expanding my skill set. At present, I am actively engaged in learning TypeScript to enhance my capabilities in building scalable and maintainable applications.

Professional Skillset

HTML5

CSS3

JavaScript

React.js

Redux

); }; export default AboutPage;
